title: Burn Card
description: Take one hunky private security owner, mix in one hunky police detective and you've started off on one hot manlove story. Things get even better though when the detective is kidnapped and no one is 100% sure why. He struggles to save himself before his lover kills his kidnapper. This story is high adrenaline all the way, and you won't want to miss the conclusion!
author: Laura Baumbach
